title: Pozoantiguo, Spain
description: Pozoantiguo is a municipality located in the province of Zamora, Castile and León, Spain. According to the 2004 census, the municipality has a population of 306 inhabitants.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
